summary: Increases damage of the Hunter\'s Prowess enchantment (from Poacher\'s Axe) from 3 to 10
descriptionHtml:
---------------
Description
---------------

-Improves the Huntsman\'s Prowess enchantment base damage from 3 -> 10
-Magicka cost increased to match

I always felt that this enchantment was rather underwhelming, especially since it was only found on one unique item. Base damage for the enchant was improved to 10 (comparable to elemental damage enchants). The Poacher\'s Axe itself still only has a +3 bonus.

Enchantment is found on the Poacher\'s Axe (000ae086) at Halted Stream Camp (bandit camp North of Whiterun).


--------------
Install
--------------

Activate with NMM

OR

Extract rar to your ...Skyrim/Data folder


--------------
Uninstall
--------------

Deactivate with NMM

OR

Delete Huntsmans Prowess Buff.esp in your ...Skyrim/Data folder
author: Dudeman325
